animeDescription: The girls are saved ... by none other than Catty Nebulart herself! Now, the race is on as Catty struggles to complete her crowning achievement: a huge machine that will bring life to a lifeless world!   (Source: AniDB)
animeVoices: ['Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Watanabe, Naoko', 'Honda, Chieko', 'Shou, Mayumi', 'Mizutani, Yuuko', 'Arakawa, Minako', 'Tomizawa, Michie']
